titles.title: Electing a certain Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing a certain Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: This resolution elects Representative Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick to the House Education and Labor Committee and the House Veterans Affairs Committee.
